# AdGlare

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="250"
  layout="responsive"
  type="adglare"
  data-host="try"
  data-zid="810958668"
  data-keywords="blue,car"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For more information, read AdGlare's blog article about [AMP Ad Tags](https://www.adglare.com/kb/51/amp-ad-server).

### Required parameters

-   `data-host`
-   `data-zid`

### Optional parameters

-   `data-keywords`
